system.sustained: The Psyker reads the Emperor's Tarot for a specific individual, gaining insight into their future. This individual may ask one question, as vague or specific as they like. Afterwards, both concentrate on this question for typically 30 minutes or more. Psyker makes a Psyniscience Test, every two degrees of success reveals more information. Psychic Phenomena rolls from this power add +10. Results: 0 DoF: Opposition: Psyker can determine the greatest opposition that will be faced. 2 DoF: Fears, the Psyker also determines other negative forces, equal to their Psy Rating, that may be at play. 4 DoF: Hopes: The Psyker can also determine the greatest advantage or tool the subject has at hand. 6 DoF: Outcome: The Psyker can also offer a single sentence of advice relating to the clearest path to achieve the individuals answer.
